name: survey-target
title: SurveyTarget
description: Specifications of characteristics of dwc:Organisms that were included or excluded in a survey.

fields.name: surveyID
fields.description: An identifier for a dwc:Event that is an biotic survey.

fields.name: surveyTargetType
fields.description: The type of scope the SurveyTarget describes.
fields.comments: Recommended best practice is to use a controlled vocabulary.

fields.name: surveyTargetTypeIRI
fields.description: The IRI of the controlled vocabulary value for the surveyTargetType.
fields.comments: Recommended best practice is to use an IRI for a term in a controlled vocabulary.

fields.name: surveyTargetTypeVocabulary
fields.description: The reference to the controlled vocabulary where the definitions of values for surveyTargetType are given.

fields.name: surveyTargetValue
fields.description: The value of a characteristic sought for the surveyTarget for a given surveyTargetType.
fields.comments: Recommended best practice is to use a controlled vocabulary.

fields.name: surveyTargetValueIRI
fields.description: The IRI for the value of the surveyTargetValue

fields.name: surveyTargetValueVocabulary
fields.description: The reference to the controlled vocabulary where the definitions of values for surveyTargetValue are given.

fields.name: surveyTargetUnit
fields.description: The units associated with the surveyTargetValue.
fields.comments: Recommended best practice is to use a controlled vocabulary.

fields.name: surveyTargetUnitIRI
fields.description: The IRI for the units of the surveyTargetValue

fields.name: surveyTargetUnitVocabulary
fields.description: The reference to the controlled vocabulary where the definitions of values for surveyTargetUnit are given.

fields.name: includeOrExclude
fields.description: A term to declare whether the instance of the SurveyTarget is an included scope or an excluded scope. Combinations of SurveyTarget records of inclusions and exclusions can define complex scopes such as all 'Aves' except 'Passeriformes'.
fields.comments: Recommended best practice is use a controlled vocabulary consisting of 'include' and 'exclude' only.

fields.name: isSurveyTargetFullyReported
fields.description: A declaration of whether the counts for the instance of the SurveyTarget report everything that matches the declared SurveyTarget. If they do, this enables inference of absence of detection for everything in that SurveyTarget that is included but that does not appear in the count.
